.. py:function:: get_activities_by_votes(city: str, countryCode: str, date: str, weather_preference: Optional[str] = 'auto', user_id: Optional[int] = 1, max_results: Optional[int] = 20)
   :async:


   Get activities filtered by weather conditions and ordered by vote count.

   :param city: City name
   :param countryCode: Country code
   :param date: Date in ISO format
   :param weather_preference: Weather preference ("auto", "indoor", "outdoor", "all")
   :param max_results: Maximum number of activities to return

   :returns: List of activities ordered by vote count (most votes first)

.. py:function:: get_recommended_activities(city: str, countryCode: str, date: str, user_id: Optional[int] = 1, weather_preference: Optional[str] = 'auto', max_results: Optional[int] = 5)
   :async:


   Get personalized activity recommendations based on:
   - Weather conditions
   - Similar user preferences
   - User profile and interests
   - Activity voting history

   :param city: City name
   :param countryCode: Country code
   :param date: Date in ISO format
   :param weather_preference: Optional weather preference ("auto", "indoor", "outdoor", "all")
   :param max_results: Maximum number of recommendations to return

   :returns: List of recommended activities ordered by relevance
